name: gilded
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ before noun ] covered with a thin layer of gold or a substance that looks like gold: The gilded dome of the cathedral rises above the city. Synonym
gilt
literary rich or of a higher social class: gilded youth The story revolves around the gilded youth of the 1920s and their glittering lifestyles.
